title: Interpretation of Istikhara prayer in a dream - Seeing reading Istikhara prayer in a dream

preview.html: Istikhara prayer dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, whether he is reading Istikhara prayer, listening to his book, or Istikhara prayer without prayer. A paper from Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and more interpretations in the topic appendix below. Istikhara prayer in a dream is one of the beautiful dreams for all Muslims and all people around the world, and supplication is a means of communication between the servant and his Lord to achieve everything we wish for in ordinary marriage. And those who are arrogant to worship Me will enter Hell in disbelief. As a supplication in a dream, it has many beautiful and important connotations for the dreamer that everyone should know. Interpretation of Istikhara in a dream and whoever dreams of supplication in a dream, this indicates a response. As explained by the great and global interpreter of dreams, seeing supplication in a dream has many important meanings and connotations that a person must know in order to obtain the correct interpretation. Interpretation of supplication in a dream Seeing begging in a dream is evidence that good is imminent for the dreamer. Seeing a person praying while asleep indicates that he desires something in his life. Seeing a person calling in a dream, but in a loud voice, is evidence that life is full of many problems and many calamities. Seeing a person seeing a group of people praying in a dream is evidence of the end of misery. Seeing a patient calling (In the name of God, by whose name nothing is harmed on earth or in heaven), is evidence that the dreamer is approaching recovery. Seeing a traveler calling in a dream means comfort and that he is on his way back to his country. Seeing a person who wants to pray in a dream and does not know how to pray is evidence of the need to get closer to God Almighty. Seeing a person who does not understand supplication in a dream means that he will commit many sins in His life. Seeing someone praying without mentioning the name of God is evidence that he is praying without respect. A person’s supplication while he is in a dark place in a dream, and his seeking help from God Almighty, is evidence of the acceptance of his supplication, so he is saved from danger. Seeing someone calling out loud is a sign of the end of many problems in life. Seeing someone praying against someone else is evidence that someone is offending the dreamer. Interpretation of supplication in a dream for a single woman Seeing an unmarried woman praying in a dream is a sign of good things on her way. A girl’s prayer in a dream out loud in a dream is evidence that God will answer her prayers in the near future. A girl’s supplication that she wants to marry a righteous man is evidence of God’s response to this request. Seeing unmarried women calling in the rain in a dream means that they will receive very happy news in the near future. Seeing someone calling in a dream and he was a righteous person is a sign of kindness. Interpretation of supplication in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman calling in a dream indicates her desire to have children. A married woman’s request in a dream for her and her children is evidence of the fulfillment of the request in the near future. A married woman’s begging in a dream Evidence of the abundance of sustenance that will come to her and her husband

A married woman’s request in a dream for herself and her children is evidence that the request will be fulfilled in the near future. title: Seeing a colorful bird in a dream

preview.html: Also, some interpreters may sometimes see that it symbolizes evil, evil, problems and difficulties that the viewer may face in his life and many interpretations that we will learn about in this article from the interpreter’s website. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing a colored bird in a dream for a single girlSeeing colored birds in a dream is A praiseworthy dream with promising interpretations. Also, some commentators interpreted this as one of the interpretations of not panicking. If an unmarried girl sees colorful birds in her dream, they fly above her head. This symbolizes this girl’s entry into a new love story and the possibility of experiencing great happiness and joy Great in this love relationship. But if a girl sees that she will slaughter colorful birds in her dream. This indicates that he will be able to overcome the problems, worries, and heartaches that he faces and get rid of them as well. If an unmarried girl sees colorful birds in her dream, she will run away home. This is good news and symbolizes a lot of happy and joyful news that you will be happy with in the very near future. If a girl dreams that she is eating the meat of these colorful birds. This expresses a happy and happy life, as well as prosperity and pleasures. And the joy that this girl may have in her life very soon. If a girl sees flocks of birds spread over her house. This expresses that this single girl will meet a large number of people. It will also increase her social participation, and this girl will have a wonderful and wonderful relationship. See also: Interpretation of seeing birds in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing a colorful bird in... A dream for a married woman: Seeing colorful birds in a married woman’s dream is a praiseworthy and promising vision. There are many interpretations of this vision, such as: If a married woman sees herself eating the meat of these colorful birds, then this vision says that she is enjoying a happy life with her husband, and that she is living the best days of her life. And that their lives are full of happiness, joy, pleasure and comfort. If a married woman sees that These birds entered her house, this is a sign of many good things. They increase money and the ability to eat, and that she and her family will actually benefit from it. If a married woman dreams that she is slaughtering these colorful birds, this expresses that she will become pregnant in the near future, God willing, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees many colorful birds in the sky in her dream. This expresses that her stress will be relieved, her distress will go away, and she will be freed from her worries and problems. It is the suffering and difficulties that she goes through and faces during her life. The screaming of colorful birds in the sky is considered loud. Very in a married woman’s dream. This symbolizes the difficulties, problems, worries, and problems that she goes through in her life and that she and her family face. Interpretation of seeing a colorful bird in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a man sees a colorful bird above his head in a dream, this means that he will succeed and excel. And he is lucky, in addition He will make a lot of profits, as well as profits. If a person sees a colorful bird, and that bird is

title: Interpretation of greeting the dead in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of greeting the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Dreams are scientifically defined as a series of unrealistic fantasies created by the human mind during the deep sleep phase while sleeping at night, which many attribute to the fact that it is an automatic response of the human mind to a specific stimulus or stimulus. He may be exposed to it during the day, or it is an internal defense device through which the human mind seeks to achieve its deep-rooted desires and motivations that it may find difficult to achieve on the ground. Throughout history, human civilizations have been interested in interpreting dreams, and interpretations have emerged from the Sumerian civilization, the oldest human civilization known. Humanity. The ancient Greeks also believed that dreams were a blessing and a precious gift from the gods that were given to the righteous to herald to them some good things that would happen to them, or to warn them of some of the defects that they might face in their coming days. Today we present to you the interpretation of seeing peace upon the dead in a dream from one of... The most prominent Islamic dream interpreters (Ibn Sirin) from the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of greeting the dead in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of greeting the dead with the hand. Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing greetings in the dead and shaking hands in a dream are among the things he likes to see, because it is usually greeting side by side with people. With whom we have a relationship of mutual affection and love. He said: Whoever sees a dead person in a dream greeting him hand in hand, this indicates the best circumstances of the one who saw the vision with God Almighty. Also, whoever sees that there is a dead person taking his hand and directing him to a place, this is a sign to the dreamer that he will have abundant money that he did not think he would ever get. Seeing a dead person hugging a dead person in a dream indicates the longevity of the dreamer in this world. Seeing greeting the dead in a dream and shaking hands with him indicates his good standing with God Almighty. Shaking hands and kissing the dead in a dream. Ibn Sirin returned to seeing shaking hands with an unknown dead person in a dream and kissing him is a sign that the dreamer has wealth and abundance from an unknown side. Also, seeing the unknown dead person in a dream and shaking hands with him Evidence that the dreamer will benefit from a benefit or knowledge that he did not know before. Interpretation of a dream about greeting the dead for single people. Ibn Sirin indicated in his book that greeting a single girl and shaking her hand are good things that indicate her purity, chastity, sincere heart, and sincere intention. Likewise, when you see an unmarried woman That she greets her mother, who was dead by God, and meets her with joy and a smile, this indicates that she will soon be blessed with an abundance of goodness because her mother is satisfied with her circumstances and good upbringing. Perhaps she will be happy with her marriage soon to a good person. Interpretation of a dream about greeting a dead person for a married woman. Ibn Sirin said: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is shaking hands with a dead person whom she knows, this is evidence that God Almighty will give her abundant goodness, and it may be from an increase in money or a promotion in. Work for her or her family members, God willing. Also, if a married woman sees herself reviving a dead person while she is unaware of it, this indicates that she is moving on.

title: Learn the interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream: There is no doubt that seeing money is an indicator of wealth, prosperity, and luxury, but it carries other meanings in the world of dreams, as some interpreters distinguish between paper money and coins. Circumstances differ from one person to another. There are situations in which one’s eyes are frantic, and other situations in which one finds disdain, and this is shown in the following points. Interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream: Paper money expresses things that do not last, whether they are problems, worries, or distress, and an abundance of paper money indicates... Responsibilities and psychological pressures. Earning a banknote indicates the fulfillment of demands and ambitions and the achievement of goals and objectives, while losing a banknote is evidence of decline, wear and tear in life. Whoever sees that he is taking paper money, he will reap his profits and money from his trade after long patience and work, but it will be stolen. Money is a sign of bad trade, and illicit profit. Paying money to others indicates freedom from worries and problems, and saving money is considered evidence of the effort expended and managing one’s livelihood, as well as an insight into one’s future and circumstances. Interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream by Ibn Siriniri Ibn Sirin Paper money or metal indicates life’s worries, aches and pains, and paper money is anguish and sadness that ceases and does not last. Whoever sees paper money must review his relationship with his Lord, as he may fail to fulfill what he owes, and finding it is evidence of discord, distress and bitter experiences. He rejects money and paper from himself, gets rid of illusions and distances himself from the world. Eating money symbolizes desires, and spending money on pleasures. Stealing money and paper is evidence of wasting time, effort and money on useless things, and keeping money in the hand indicates great responsibility and honesty. Interpretation Seeing paper money in a dream for a single woman. Paper money in her dream symbolizes the tension of disagreement, harsh circumstances, many worries and problems, and the failure to achieve desires, achieve goals, and receive money from parents is evidence of a constant need and resort to it. Finding banknotes on the ground and collecting them indicates the outbreak of a serious quarrel or A long-term dispute, and a large amount of money in the house, is evidence of difficulty and difficulty in coexistence and a succession of crises and sorrows. If the bill is green, then these are profits, livelihoods, and opportunities that you enjoy at work. Red money indicates excessive desires and feelings, and blue is evidence of fears. And self-talk and the difficulty of achieving stability. Interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream for a married woman: Banknotes in her dream indicate the difficulties and problems of life, the weight of responsibilities and duties, and giving bills is evidence of struggle, good work, and helping others as much as possible. Receiving money from the husband symbolizes the transfer of all duties To it, collecting money indicates hardship and harsh conditions, and counting money expresses the judgments and problems that arise

title: Interpretation of seeing a sum of money in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a sum of money: In a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq, scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com, as seeing a lot of money in a dream is a sign of goodness and righteousness. The upcoming food for the pioneer and the cessation of worries and sorrows, so we will talk about the interpretation of this vision for an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a new man and a divorced man. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself giving money to another person in a dream? Seeing yourself giving money to another person in a dream is an indication that he earned Obtaining a lot of livelihood through property or inheritance from a relative and through improving his financial circumstances. Seeing yourself giving money to another person in a dream, in the form of charity, is a sign of people’s need for it and his intense love for goodness. Seeing yourself giving a lot of money in a dream to a stranger is a statement of increase Debts on the viewer and the deterioration of his financial condition. See also: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream about giving money to an unmarried girl? Seeing a single girl giving coins A stranger shows her that she is facing many problems and difficulties in life. Seeing a single girl having a lot of money Giving her For others, it is a sign that he owns really valuable things and is trying to help the poor. Dreaming of single people taking money from people indicates that he will soon obtain expensive things, such as wealth or a luxury car. Seeing money in a dream indicates that she is facing some difficulties as she reaches her life’s dream. See also: Interpretation of a dream about losing money. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself taking money from another person in a dream? Dreaming about taking money from another person greatly indicates the improvement of his financial circumstances and the coming of goodness and abundant blessing upon him. Seeing asking for money from someone in a dream is an indication of his great need for help. Others, whether material, moral, or emotional. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman giving money to another person in a dream? Seeing a married woman giving gold coins to another person in a dream is an indication that you bring him happiness, kindness, and psychological comfort. Seeing a married woman giving money to others in a dream is an indication that you are bringing him happiness, kindness, and psychological comfort. The dream indicates the many disagreements and problems with her husband, efforts to get closer to God, and the repeated call for forgiveness to calm her mind. See also: Interpretation of seeing losing money in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing giving money to Al-Nabulsi in a dream? Seeing giving money in a dream to Al-Nabulsi A pregnant woman will be considered a sign that she will have a righteous son And many children. Seeing yourself giving a dirham to another person in a dream indicates religiosity, a lot of repentance, reading the Qur’an and always doing it well. Seeing a lot of money in a dream indicates comfort, luxury, the dreamer’s preservation of other people’s secrets, and people’s love for him. See also: Interpretation of seeing a gift of money in a dream. Dream: What is the interpretation of seeing money given to another person in a dream by Ibn Shaheen? Seeing yourself giving money to another person in a dream to Ibn Shaheen indicates good treatment of others and peace of mind of the dreamer. Seeing yourself giving the dirham in a bad way to

title: Seeing a poem in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Hair in a dream People who live in Bedouin places build a house of camel skins and live in it, and it is called the House of Hair, but when someone sees it in a dream, it can be a sign of the guardianship of a great power and be benevolent. News for him, and it can also symbolize hearing bad news about the dreamer, and this varies according to the detailed knowledge of the dream, and in this article we will explain to you the appropriate interpretation of this dream according to the social situation. From the dreamer. Poetry in a dream When the dreamer sees a poem in a dream, this may indicate that he will assume great leadership such as the presidency or parliament, or that he may assume great administrative responsibility at work. If the dreamer is applying for a job such as the public prosecutor’s office, state council, aviation, and many more jobs The other, and he saw a verse of poetry in the dream, then this may be a good omen for his acceptance into this job. Seeing a verse in a dream could be a sign that the dreamer will earn a lot of money in the coming period. Dreaming of a verse of poetry may indicate that the dreamer will change his place of residence and move To a new place from the place where he lives. Ibn Sirin’s poetry in a dream. If the dreamer sees that he lives in a house of poetry, this may mean that he will move to a new job and achieve many goals. Ibn Sirin believes that the house of poetry symbolizes in a dream that the dreamer has a strong personality And a love of controlling others. When a person sees a poem in a dream, this means that he will move abroad to work in a prestigious job in the near future. If the verse is new and has a distinctive shape, this is a sign that the dreamer will hear some good news. A verse of poetry in a dream for a single woman when A girl sees a verse in a dream, it symbolizes success and excellence in the academic year, and seeing a verse in a dream can indicate a close marriage with a rich man who has a lot of money and a high status. If a girl sees that she is standing in front of a verse of poetry, this means that she will find a job opportunity New or starting a new project of her own. If a girl dreams that she is living with a man she knows well in that house, this is a sign that she will marry her life partner and live a love story that will last for many years. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a white dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a white dress in a dream or a wedding dress, because it contains many different interpretations that scholars differ in their interpretation, as seeing a white dress varies from one person to another, and this vision indicates many connotations in life that we know clearly and completely through the interpretation of the dream. The white dress in a dream according to translators and great jurists. Interpretation of a dream about a white dress by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a white linen dress is evidence for the dreamer to make money. The white dress in a dream is an indication of the beauty of the world and true religion. Seeing white temptation in a dream indicates marriage to a man. Saleh. Seeing a white dress interprets the dreamer’s birth. Seeing a woman in a white dress in a dream is an indication of the joy and happiness she will feel in her life. Looking for the white dress on the wedding day indicates the extent of distraction and loss that the dreamer is suffering from. Seeing yourself wearing a dress Dirty white indicates sadness. Interpretation of a dream about a white dress for a married woman: Seeing a white dress in a dream is a sign of concealment and kindness. Also, seeing a married woman wearing a white dress in her dream indicates a happy married life and the extent to which her husband loves her. Seeing a white dress indicates getting rid of From pain and problems. White in general in a dream symbolizes goodness in religion and life. Seeing a married woman you hate in a white dress is a sign that she is not getting what she wants. A white dress in a dream for a married woman is also a sign of pregnancy soon. A white dress in a dream A married woman is evidence of the marriage of her sister or relative. Interpretation of a dream about a white dress for a divorced woman or a widow: When you see a widow or a divorced woman in a white dress, this is a sign of concealment and goodness in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a white dress for a single woman: Seeing single women wearing a white dress indicates concealment. And marrying her and the extent of her conviction. Seeing the color white in a dream indicates the fairness of the situation and the extent of his continuation of worship. Seeing a young girl in a white dress is evidence that she will succeed in education and her family. Interpretation of a dream about a white dress for a pregnant woman: Seeing the color white in general in a pregnant woman’s dream is A sign of recovery, her safety, and the safety of her fetus. A white dress in a dream is also evidence of the soonest date of birth.

title: Talking to the dead in a dream

preview.html: If the dreamer speaks to the dead person while he is very angry in the dream, this is a sign that the dreamer is committing disobedience and sins in his life and committing immoral acts and he must return to God Almighty and the path of truth again in life. From.Interpretation of seeing a conversation with a dead person in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl saw in a dream that she was talking to the deceased, but he was very sad for her in the dream. It indicates the presence of some sins and transgressions that this unmarried girl committed during her life. During this period, seeing an unmarried girl A married woman in a dream said that she was looking at the deceased and talking to him in the dream, and she felt happy. This is an indication that she will prolong her life, God willing, and live her life in health and peace, and God knows best. The unmarried girl who was seen in the dream looks at the dead person while he was talking, but she did not pay attention to him in The dream or his anger. This is explained by the fact that there is a great bequest from this deceased to the dreamer, but he did not do what he was told about it, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Either the unmarried girl who sees the dead in a dream, quarrels with them a lot, and speaks with great anger in the dream. It explains that he will Very bad things for her and her family during this time of her life, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dead person crying in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing a dead person talking in a dream about a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream that she is talking to a dead person, but the matter was very bad with her. This is an indication of the many problems that this married woman will see in her life at this time, and God knows best. And a married woman seeing that she wants to talk to the dead person in a dream, but he did not care about her in the dream. This indicates that he is talking about that dead person in the dream, and that he will face A lot of bad things. This is how a married woman sees in a dream, that she was looking at a dead man in a dream, and she was very sad. It indicates that she committed some sins against that dead person in her life, and God is Most High. And seeing a married woman in a dream means that she She looks at the dead, and talks to them in a dream with great anger. She explains that she will fall into the midst of very big machinations by people close to her in her life during this time as well. Interpretation of seeing a conversation with a dead person in a dream about a divorced womanIf a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is talking to a dead person In a dream, he was very sad for her. It indicates that at this time she feels very lonely in her life and that she is suffering from many bad things in her life. A divorced woman who sees in a dream that the deceased is talking to her, laughing a lot, and being happy in the dream. This indicates that she will encounter many good things in her life. In this period of time, and God knows best. Either the dreaming divorced woman looks at the deceased in a dream, and talks to her about a very important topic in the dream. Here is a clear explanation that this divorced woman will get rid of some of the major worries that she is going through in her life. And the divorced woman talks to the deceased in A dream, and he was very angry with her in the dream, and she did not accept the conversation. This is an indication that this divorced woman

title: Seeing a living dead person in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, and the interpretation of a dream about a dead person taking a living person

preview.html: Seeing a living dead person in a dream. When we experience the loss of someone close to us due to death, we feel sadness and pain as a result of this person’s separation, and also when we see in a dream the death of one of the people around us. While he is still alive, we wake up and are filled with fear and anxiety for this person and search for a suitable interpretation of this vision and whether it brings goodness or not. Seeing a living dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream? The interpretation of seeing a living dead person in a dream is one of the visions that It suggests that the dreamer will enjoy the luxury of life and a happy and stable life free of problems and crises. If he sees that someone from his relatives has died in a dream, this is a sign that this person will have a long life in this world. The dreamer seeing that a living person died in his dream, but returned to Life, indicates that the dreamer committed some shameful actions, but he repented to God and gave up those actions. If he hears of the death of a person in a dream while he is alive, this is evidence that he will be exposed to some hardships and crises. Seeing a living dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that when he sees The dreamer is dead and alive in his sleep, then this vision is the result of the difficult pressures he has been exposed to in the recent period, which causes him to go through an unstable psychological state that makes him vulnerable to it. that they. Visions. He also interpreted that seeing living dead people in the dreamer’s dream is evidence of his desire to hide some secrets from those close to him. He also indicated that the vision could be an indication of his separation from a person close to him as a result of disagreements and mutual accusations between the two sides. Seeing Ali indicates that the person The one who saw him dying in his dream will travel abroad for a long time. To get the correct interpretation, do a search on Google, the Egyptian dream interpretation site. Seeing a dead living person in a single woman’s dream. The interpretation of seeing a dead woman alive in a single woman’s dream varies depending on the person who died in Her dream. If this person is her fiancé, then this is evidence of the imminence of their marriage. Seeing the death of her brother while he is alive means that she will receive some benefits or benefits from that brother, and if it was her sister who died in her dream, then this is evidence of upcoming joys and happy occasions for her. If She saw that she died in her dream, then this vision is a sign that she will face many difficult crises in her life, and she also suffers from a bad psychological state. When she sees that there is a person alive and he died in her dream, and there was no cry or lamentation around him, this indicates However, she will be blessed soon, and it indicates the achievement of various successes in various areas of life. Seeing the death of her close friend while she is still alive is evidence that she will get rid of all the obstacles she is exposed to in her life. Seeing a living dead person in a married woman’s dream. For a woman to dream of If a married woman sees the death of a member of her family while she is alive, this means that she will receive a large family inheritance that will benefit her and her family. If she sees that her husband is the one who died in her dream, this is evidence of her intense love for him and the stability of their marital relationship.

title: Interpretation of seeing the sky raining fish according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of seeing the sky raining fish. Rain fish in a dream as a whole is a sign of the abundance of goodness and abundance of sustenance. In the rain there is always salvation from drought and high temperatures. Ibn Sirin explained that when you dream of rain from the sky in the form of a fish, this is evidence of goodness and abundance of sustenance, but the interpretation varies depending on The case of the fortuneteller, and this is what we will discuss in our article. Today in the encyclopedia in detail, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing the sky raining fish. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of the sky raining fish according to the condition of the fortuneteller and its differences as follows: Seeing the sky raining fish for a young man according to Ibn Sirin. If a young man sees in his dream that the sky is raining fish on him, this is a sign of abundant Food that comes to him without counting it and he does not know where it comes from, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for whoever sees in his dream that the sky is raining fish on him and he tries to catch it, this is a sign of a good opportunity and livelihood on his way to the dreamer, and he will be able to catch it. God is Most High and Most Knowing. And if the young man is in reality suffering from many problems, then for him this vision is good news of comfort and salvation by God’s command, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about fish descending from the sky to an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl or who has never been married before sees that The sky is raining a lot of fish, then this is a sign of the abundance of goodness and wide satisfaction that is on its way to the dreamer, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Ibn Sirin believes that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that the sky is raining a lot of fish and she is happy about it, this is evidence that the girl She will be blessed with a good husband who will make her happy and fear God. In it, God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing the sky raining fish for a married woman. Ibn Sirin believes that a married woman’s vision of the sky raining fish indicates the abundance of money, kindness, and great livelihood that will come to her home, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It also indicates that her husband will be blessed with money whether he earns a career or is promoted to a position. A prestigious job in which he is blessed with abundance and permissibility, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. I dream of fish falling from the sky for a pregnant woman. Ibn Sirin believes that when a pregnant woman sees rain in the shape of a fish in her dream, it will be easy for that person to give birth and that her fetus will be born in complete health and that it will be cured of all Diseases. God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if a pregnant woman sees the fish descending from the sky above her house, this is a sign that a lot of food and money will come to her house, and that the coming days will bring her human joy and God’s good news. God is Most High and Most Knowing.Interpretation of the fish descending from the sky to the divorced woman. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a fish descending from the sky in a dream of the divorced woman is a sign of relief from anxiety and distress and that many of the problems that the dreamer suffers from will be solved by God’s command and success, and God is Most High. And He knows best. Raining fish in a dream for a divorced woman is a sign of following a broad diet and the abundance of goodness that will come to her in the near future by order of God, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretations of a dream about a big fish. Seeing a big fish in a dream is a sign of abundant sustenance and
